text: (nabiye!) movun bhumiyehi samcaraya kale nædda? (samcaraya kara tibune nam), movunta pera visuvange avasanaya kese vuveda yanna dæka ganu æta. (pera visu) ovun nam, saktiyenda, bhumiyehi athæra dama giya (purana) salakunu valinda, movunta vada balasampannayan vasayenma sitiyaha. (ehet) ovunge papayanhi hetuven ovunva allah alla gatteya. allahge (grahanayen) ovunva bera gænimata kisivekut sitiye næta
